name: Skylight Cave
description:
Short prototype made for Mini Jam 109: Depth(s).

(Note: Title should probably be Skylight pond, cave, pond, whatever, I've been using the terms interchangeably in this project '^^ )

The objective is to locate all species in the pond/cave. The total number is listed in the bottom left during gameplay. To discover a species, just get close to it.

Controls: WASDMoveMouseLook around
